rounds.response: [2] *(Strategic Insight: Occupying the top-right corner (position 2) simultaneously completes our top row two-mark threat [X,0,2] and neutralizes two critical offensive vectors for Player 0: the last-column attack [2,5,8] and the anti-diagonal fork [2,4,6]. This forces them into a defensive response on the top row next turn, granting us tempo.*)

rounds.response: [7] *(Strategic Insight: Blocking the opponent's imminent win condition in the middle column [1,4,7] is imperative. By securing position 7, we neutralize their two-mark vertical threat while simultaneously creating a potential dual-threat scenario for upcoming turns. Our existing mark at position 0 sets a foundation for controlling the left column [0,3,6], and position 7 establishes a foothold in the bottom row [6,7,8]—forcing Player 0 into a reactive position.*)

rounds.response: [Player 1] [5] *(Strategic Insight: Occupying position 5 is essential to block Player 0's immediate win threat in the middle row [3,4,5]. Since our mark at position 2 already neutralizes diagonal threats and no winning combination exists for us this turn, forcing a defensive stance prevents opponent victory and likely leads to a draw—optimal play given board constraints. Note: Player 0 must take the final cell (6) next turn, concluding the game without vertical/diagonal wins.)*
